title: Elec Packaging Assembly
description: The course provides hands-on instruction in electronics packaging, including assembly, reliability, thermal management, and test of next-generation microsystems. Crosslisted with ECE and ME 4754.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 3040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3710 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
